review_data.title: Delicious Spanish tapas in Zürich
review_data.content: Delicious Spanish tapas + beer/wine after work. Tapas del día always a great choice. Service will recommend you a nice wine to drink together with the tapas

review_data.title: Tapas place for every occasion!
review_data.content: This is a hidden gem in my opinion: they have San Miguel on tap and a decent selection of cold and hot tapas. Staff is generally ok and you can get a table most of the time. Good value for money!

review_data.title: Good tapas!
review_data.content: Nice bar, welcoming staff and good food. We tried 6 different warm and cold tapas and enjoyed them all.

review_data.title: Cozy place for a drink and snacks at night
review_data.content: Very helpful staff and very friendly service, plus delicious food, good wine! We were very satisfied and the price is also friendly. It is absolutely a right place to go after a light dinner and for chill out!

review_data.title: Solid Tapas

review_data.title: Favourite restaurant – worth finding
